mapper.select: SELECT branch_no branchNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, item_name itemName, expire_memo expireMemo, quantity, createdate FROM sports_equipment_expire
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sportsEquipmentExpire( sports_equipment_no sportsEpuipmentNo, branch_no branchNo, item_name itemName, quantity, expire_memo expireMemo ) VALUES ( #{sportsEquipmentNo}, #{branchNo}, #{itemName}, #{quantity}, #{expireMemo} )
